long_description: Make getting to the gym quick and convenient with the REI Tech Beast 40L Gym duffel. It's designed and organized for gym and locker use, but easily crosses over for general-purpose travel. Size and shape fit conveniently into gym lockers and airline overhead bins; main access is designed to be used while hanging in your locker. Large U-shape main compartment has 2-way zip opening; interior zippered pocket and mesh zip pocket under the lid panel add organization. Separate end compartment is vented and seam sealed with waterproof fabric, providing a great place to stash shoes or wet clothes. Exterior end pocket fits a 1-liter bottle (not included). Exterior organizational pocket includes a key fob. Ergonomic shape has padded backside and conforms to your body for a comfortable carry. REI Tech Beast Gym duffel is made from rugged, water-repellent materials; light-colored lining lets you find items easily. Adjustable-length shoulder strap with sliding shoulder pad provides comfort and secure single-shoulder carry. This item meets carry-on size restrictions for most airlines (size not to exceed 45 linear inches when adding L+W+H; this is subject to change, so check with your airline).
short_description: Make getting to the gym quick and convenient with the REI Tech Beast 40L Gym duffel. It's designed and organized for gym and locker use, but easily crosses over for general-purpose travel.
